CARD.TITLE: The home of DIY curtains
CARD.CONTENT: The Curtain and Blind Company is a Perth-based window furnishings company with a business model centred on Commerce sales for made-to-measure and ready-made products. After previously stalled effort to overhaul their web presence, they approached Humaan to bring their vision of a premium eCommerce experience to life.

CARD.TITLE: The top 50 restaurants in WA
CARD.CONTENT: The WA Good Food Guide celebrates Western Australiaâ€™s Top 50 restaurants, as deemed by the West Australian Good Food Guide Awards. Originally a paper publication, the Good Food Guide was ready to establish a fresh new presence, engaging its audience with a gourmet digital experience.
